rules_text:
Flying
{5}{R}{R}: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. It gains haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
